item.title: Rubbish fly tipped outside 28B Sun Lane SE3, 13th January

item.title: Blcoked drain on corner of Euston road / Upper woburn place outside Prezzo, 13th January
item.description:
Whenever it rains the drain at the above location gets blocked and the water spreads all over the pavement and its extremely dangerous and can not walk on it, so have to walk in the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Euston Square, St Pancras, Greater London

item.title: Major pothole in the junction with tower ridge road, 13th January
item.description:
There is a major unavoidable pothole in the left lane as you come out of Grange Road onto Tower Bridge Road. Not sure what the cause is but it has only occurred in the last 7 days as I use this route regularly. Unfortunately I was unable to take a picture as its a busy junction and I was driving but it cannot be missed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large area of road surface is cracked andcbadly depresssed and has been this way for many months. With cold weather surface is now breaking up badly and potholes are growing., 13th January
item.description:
Several large areas of road surface has been cracked and depressed for months. Now the surface is developing holes in the surface. Please resolve this long standing issue as vehicles frequently swerve towards oncoming traffic to avoid depressed areas and potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fraser Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside The Place, 13th January

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Duke's Road, St Pancras, Greater London

item.title: Bin Collection - Rubbish everywhere, 13th January
item.description:
On several occasions the bin collection has left waste all over the street include a large amount broken glass, which we have swept up. It is utterly disgusting and can not believe believe the bin collectors have created such a hazard and mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Hindmans Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles parked on both sides of the road on a blind corner, 13th January
item.description:
Boundary Road - Vehicles park on bend on both sides of the road that have no yellow line restrictions however travelling up Boundary Road or from Ridgeway West the corner is blind and vehicles are forced into the offside to come around the corner. I have witnessed, and been party to a number of near collisions when vehicles are travelling in opposite directions making this a dangerous occurrence that will eventually result in a serious collision.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Boundary Road, Falconwood, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
